Comment: He found absolutely ZERO waste and fraud. If you work in the government, you know that while there is some waste, there is not a lot. The primary reason: there is barely enough money to cover the salaries and benefits of the people working there.  Most people in goverment jobs are working on 2-10 year old computers, running windows 7-10, and some ancient version of office. They might have migrated to 365. Maybe.  Most databases are held together with duct tape and chewing gum, and anyone who breathes wrong on it will bring the entire system down.  Where is the majority of fraud, waste, and abuse? With the contractors. They exorbitantly bid on projects, they over-promise and under-deliver routinely.   There are laws in place where a certain percentage of work that goes on with the government MUST be outsourced to contractors. So the powers that be make sure their buddies get those contracts, they never really expect them to produce the product they are paying for, and eventually the in-house teams build whatever it is themselves.  Almost 100% of Fraud, Waste, and Abuse resides with the contractors who are bilking the government for hundreds of billions of dollars.  He should have started there, the absolute idiot.
